verses.verse: <S%H199>Therefore<s%>, <S%H347>Job<s%>, I pray <S%H8085>you<s%>, hear my <S%H4405>speeches<s%>, and <S%H238>listen<s%> to all my <S%H1697>words<s%>.
<S%H6605>Behold<s%>, now I have opened my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H2441>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H561>words<s%> shall be of the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>: and my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall <S%H4448>utter<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H1305>clearly<s%>.
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5397>me<s%>, and the breath of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> has given me <S%H2421>life<s%>.
If you <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H6186>me<s%>, set your words in order <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3320>me<s%>, stand up.
<S%H6310>Behold<s%>, I am according to your wish in <S%H410>God<s%>'s <S%H7169>place<s%>: I also am formed out of the <S%H2563>clay<s%>.
<S%H367>Behold<s%>, my terror shall not make you <S%H1204>afraid<s%>, neither shall my <S%H405>hand<s%> be heavy upon <S%H3513>you<s%>.
Surely you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing<s%>, and I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H4405>words<s%>, saying,
I am <S%H2134>clean<s%> without <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, I am <S%H2643>innocent<s%>; neither is there iniquity in <S%H5771>me<s%>.
<S%H4672>Behold<s%>, he finds <S%H8569>occasions<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>, he counts me for his <S%H341>enemy<s%>,
He <S%H7760>puts<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks<s%>, he <S%H8104>marks<s%> all my <S%H734>paths<s%>.
<S%H6663>Behold<s%>, in this you are not just: I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H433>you<s%>, that God is <S%H7235>greater<s%> than <S%H582>man<s%>.
Why do you <S%H7378>argue<s%> against <S%H6030>him<s%>? for he gives not account of any of his <S%H1697>matters<s%>.
For <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H259>once<s%>, Yes <S%H8147>twice<s%>, yet man perceives it <S%H7789>not<s%>.

In a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, in a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, when <S%H8639>deep<s%> sleep <S%H5307>falls<s%> upon <S%H582>men<s%>, in <S%H8572>slumberings<s%> upon the <S%H4904>bed<s%>;
Then he <S%H1540>opens<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H2856>seals<s%> their <S%H4561>instruction<s%>,
That he may <S%H5493>withdraw<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>purpose<s%>, and <S%H3680>hide<s%> <S%H1466>pride<s%> from <S%H1397>man<s%>.
He keeps <S%H2820>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, and his <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H5674>perishing<s%> by the <S%H7973>sword<s%>.
He is <S%H3198>chastened<s%> also with <S%H4341>pain<s%> upon his <S%H4904>bed<s%>, and the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H6106>bones<s%> with strong <S%H386>pain<s%>:
So that his <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H2092>abhors<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8378>dainty<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%>.
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is consumed <S%H3615>away<s%>, that it cannot be <S%H7210>seen<s%>; and his <S%H6106>bones<s%> that were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> stick <S%H8192>out<s%>.
<S%H5315>Yes<s%>, his soul draws <S%H7126>near<s%> unto the <S%H7845>grave<s%>, and his <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4191>destroyers<s%>.

If <S%H3426>there<s%> be a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> with <S%H3887>him<s%>, an interpreter, <S%H259>one<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, to <S%H5046>show<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%> his <S%H3476>uprightness<s%>:
Then he is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, and says, <S%H6308>Deliver<s%> him from going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>: I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%>.
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H7375>fresher<s%> than a <S%H5290>child<s%>'s: he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth<s%>:

He shall <S%H6279>pray<s%> unto <S%H433>God<s%>, and he will be <S%H7521>favorable<s%> unto <S%H7200>him<s%>: and he shall see his <S%H6440>face<s%> with <S%H8643>joy<s%>: for he will <S%H7725>render<s%> unto <S%H582>man<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
He <S%H7789>looks<s%> upon <S%H582>men<s%>, and if any <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and <S%H5753>perverted<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%>, and it profited me <S%H7737>not<s%>;
He will <S%H6299>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> into the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, and his <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>.
<S%H6466>Behold<s%>, all these things works <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6471>oftentimes<s%> with <S%H1397>man<s%>,
To bring <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, to be <S%H215>enlightened<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
Mark <S%H7181>well<s%>, O <S%H347>Job<s%>, <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H2790>me<s%>: hold your peace, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
If you <S%H3426>have<s%> any thing to <S%H4405>say<s%>, <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>: speak, for I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to justify <S%H6663>you<s%>.
If <S%H8085>not<s%>, listen unto <S%H2790>me<s%>: hold your peace, and I shall <S%H502>teach<s%> you <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
